definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BeanSword</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Transform</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The Bean was transformed into an Ultimate Bean!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">BeanItIsStruckByLightning</field></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
